content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How can we help you today? Are you having an issue with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
Hi there. I was actually thinking of getting some plumbing work done, but I'm not sure if I'll have time to schedule anything this month.
Thanks for letting us know! If you have a moment, I can help you get a tentative appointment on the calendar, and you can reschedule if needed. Could I have your name to get started?
Honestly, I'm really swamped this month. I don't think I'll be able to commit to anything right now. Maybe I'll reach out again when things slow down.
No worries at all! We completely understand. Feel free to contact us anytime when you're ready. If you need anything urgent, we're just a message away. Have a great day!
reason: Customer too busy to schedule this month
